channel.title: Notorious - Experience True Excellence. Win An iPhone 6!
channel.description:
[color=purple][center][size=4][font=arial, helvetica, sans-serif]Hi guys, I'm posting this project thread primarily to tell you about our new contest that we've hosting. I intend to get an advertisement thread out on the 1st of November which will be much more professional than this thread!
Let me clearly state that this thread is not for discussing occurrences between myself and Raw Envy. Leave that out. This is for my server, Notorious, and mainly just to tell people about our new domain and that we do still exist.
I'll include some media but like I say, we'll be releasing a proper advertisement thread in the Advertisement board very soon.
So, welcome to Notorious. My first priority is to make you aware of our current competition whereby you can actually win an iPhone 6 once we release our server. You can read more about that [b][url=http://notorious-rsps.com/forum/index.php?/topic/360-server-launch-event1112015-iphone-6-reward/]here[/url][/b].
[size=5]Notorious Team:[/size]
[b]Harry[/b] & [b]Liam[/b] - Main Owners
[b]Hacker[/b] - Client Developer [b]3clipse[/b] - Server/Client Developer [b]Sam Mosuime[/b] - Server Developer [b]Nouish[/b] - Server Developer [b]Elon Musk [/b]- Server Developer
[b]Izz[/b] - Forums Manager [b]Mister Slyther[/b] - Forums Manager [b]Bjorn & Pixels[/b] - GFX Artists
[size=5]Notorious Features:[/size]
Revenant Cave Stable Economy Active PKing Quick Prayers Quick Curses Challenging Minigames Enjoyable Bosses Promo Code System Refferal System Advanced Client Ironman Mode 100+ Achievements Professional, well mannered and highly competent staff and developers Loyalty Titles Pk Bounties Bounty Hunter System Completionist Cape + Max Cape Fun Slayer System Unique Training Zones Bank Searching Bank Tabs Fully working Clue Scrolls
[size=5]Notorious Media:[/size]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2qfe00T.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ThPutrY.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bzeHKCt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VMIvyMB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PJDlDwy.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/3jKkXbD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FQPhDAg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/45Zf04y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ywTBv1D.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YGBbrvZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/V9Wqnde.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ELUwDMb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NKmXACY.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gvLJvnq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/b7viOJ2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uxpkGM7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Fe0LaXV.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QWYFmlJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qSipRCu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/opxFGCb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.prntscr.com/3c9dffabd5964a8494c5a26712628d73.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/P64zSK3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/R07PTl8.png[/img]
All the best,
Notorious Management[/font][/size][/center]

item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

[color=purple][center][size=4][font=arial, helvetica, sans-serif]Hi guys, I’m posting this project thread primarily to tell you about our new contest that we’ve hosting. I intend to get an advertisement thread out on the 1st of November which will be much more professional than this thread!

Let me clearly state that this thread is not for discussing occurrences between myself and Raw Envy. Leave that out. This is for my server, Notorious, and mainly just to tell people about our new domain and that we do still exist.

I’ll include some media but like I say, we’ll be releasing a proper advertisement thread in the Advertisement board very soon.

So, welcome to Notorious. My first priority is to make you aware of our current competition whereby you can actually win an iPhone 6 once we release our server. You can read more about that here.
